EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Information (1352494612.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Information (1352494612.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Stephanie, We did have a great conversation, he was such a pleasure to speak with! The next step would be for him to enroll in our system. I sent him a link after we spoke last week, which he will need to follow to our site, fill out the online paperwork (about 20 minutes of first day on the job type paperwork) and then at the end there is a benefits summary he will electronically sign and in that summary is an I9 form that he can print off. He will need to take it to a local notary and have them sign as an authorized representative witnessing his signature and fax or email that back to me. The other piece will be getting me in contact with his client so we can work to put an agreement in place. I know he had some hesitation around this as he did not want to stir the pot with the client by asking to put a new agreement in place, so if he does not want to do that, I will just need for him to sign the acknowledgement form (I have included the link below) saying he understands what that means for him. http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement_Form.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement_Form.pdf> I will need the client to at least fill out a SOW (link below). I can prefill some of it but there are certain pieces of information around invoicing I won’t know, so if they are willing to fill it out that would be great (or if you know the information you could fill it out and relay that to them for signature). http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> I will be in the office until about 5:30 EST today so if you would like to speak in more detail about this please reach out to me. Thank you and have a great weekend!Nicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, November 09, 2012 1:26 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information Hi Nicolette, I spoke with John and he said he had a great conversation with you and wants me to go ahead and get him set up with MBO partners. What is the next step? Thanks,StephanieOn Tue, Oct 30, 2012 at 8:53 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Stephanie, No worries, I see the new appointment on my calendar and look forward to speaking with him. Have a great day!Nicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com <mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com>] Sent: Monday, October 29, 2012 6:31 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information Hi Nicolette, Sorry to do this at the last minute, but something unavoidable came up, and John will be unavailable for the phone appointment tomorrow. I rescheduled it for Wed. Thanks,StephanieOn Fri, Oct 26, 2012 at 1:23 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Stephanie, Great thank you! I look forward to speaking with John next week. Have a great weekend JNicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com <mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com>] Sent: Friday, October 26, 2012 2:35 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information Thanks, Nicolette. We've been working on a few logistical things, before setting this up, but should be ready now. I scheduled a phone appointment for you to call John on Tues. Thanks!On Thu, Sep 20, 2012 at 4:12 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Stephanie, You may follow this link: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> Thank you and have a great weekend! Nicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com <mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com>] Sent: Thursday, September 20, 2012 6:11 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information I'll talk to him and find out. How should I go about scheduling an appointment for him to speak with you? Should i just schedule that online?On Thu, Sep 20, 2012 at 4:07 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Stephanie, I would like to speak with John before we actually move forward, but the next steps would be for him to complete the online enrollment process and introduce us to the client to start working on getting a contract in place. Would he be able to speak on Monday to walk through the basics and talk about next steps then? Please advise, Thank you!Nicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com <mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com>] Sent: Thursday, September 20, 2012 2:22 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information Thanks for the information, Nicolette. This looks like this may be something that will work for us. What are the steps we need to take to get this set up?On Wed, Sep 5, 2012 at 6:31 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:That is correct…it only applies after the first 30 days. Thank you, Nicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com <mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com>] Sent: Wednesday, September 05, 2012 7:17 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information Thanks, Nicolette. That makes sense, but on page 1 of the Summary of Coverage it states:
"To become insured for Supplemental Life Insurance coverage, certain requirements will need to be met. You can become insured for Supplemental Life Insurance in excess of $100,000 as long as you submit evidence of good health, and Aetna approves. If Aetna does not approve your evidence of good health, the amount of Supplemental Life Insurance will be limited to the Guaranteed Standard Issue amount."
Is HR saying that this statement only applies after the 30 days?On Wed, Sep 5, 2012 at 9:13 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Stephanie, This is the response I received back from my HR Support Team: “If enrolling during their initial eligibility period (30 days after transition date), no EOI is needed, no matter the amount elected. If enrolling outside of this period, an EOI is sometimes needed. If the person is electing basic group life ($50k) no EOI is needed. If the person already has supplemental and is electing to increase the value by $10k, no EOI is needed. But If the person is electing supplemental for the first time, or is increasing the value by more than $10k, and EOI is needed. “ Basically, you are guaranteed coverage with no underwriting if any LI is elected in the first 30 days, and would only need EOI if it is past the 30 days and are electing more than $10,000 in supplemental coverage then the EOI is needed and will be sent to the insurance company for approval. Please let me know if you have any additional questions about this. Thanks!Nicolette From: stephanie johnson [mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com <mailto:sjohnson8933@gmail.com>] Sent: Tuesday, September 04, 2012 2:41 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information Thanks for the information, Nicolette. I was reading over some of the paperwork regarding benefits, and had a question about the life insurance. On the MBO Life and Disability overview and rates sheet, it said that you offered guaranteed issue of both life ($50,000) and supplemental life insurance (up to $250,000). The Aetna summary of coverage mentioned the need to submit evidence of good health to go over the Guaranteed Standard Issue, which I believe is $100,000. I guess my question is, between the basic life insurance and the supplemental life insurance, how much of it is the guaranteed issue, with no medical underwriting required? From what I've read it seems to be $50,000 for the basic, and $100,000 for the supplemental, but I wanted to make sure I was understanding that correctly.
If you could help clarify this for us, I'd appreciate it. I just want to make sure we understand your policies.
I did schedule a phone call with you regarding this for Wed morning because I wasn't sure if email was a good way to contact you, but if you can answer this question via email, you don't need to call me tomorrow morning.
Thank you so much for your time! Stephanie JohnsonOn Tue, Sep 4, 2012 at 9:49 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Stephanie, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in reviewing our services with John. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- In addition we have a index of recorded Webinars that will cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. If you have questions, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you again soon. Have a great day, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 <tel:703.793.6281>f: 703.793.6456 <tel:703.793.6456>e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFtWvUll5PLBe%2Fq%2BvzLNe5Gk9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
